page.title: 14GENERAL LANDSCAPE,TREVERVA
page.content: The general landscape is made up of hills,narrow bendy roads and several quarries,also there are 4 farms spaced out unevenly.The farmland is mainly rough grazing land.From one of the highest points we could see several miles around us including the radar dishes at Goonhilly Downs. All of the quarries we saw are derelict.In our grid squares there is a certain amount of woodland consisting mainly of dense fir trees.Wasteland and derelict land is made up of disused quarries and different types of ferns and bracken. Nearly all of the land consists of fields and the roads are narrow and winding.
